alert.note: Alert for Medina; Uvalde (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 04 at 3:27PM CDT until June 04 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Medina County in south central Texas... East central Uvalde County in south central Texas... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 327 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles southeast of Utopia, or 15 miles southwest of Tarpley, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hondo, Sabinal and D`Hanis. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail, damaging winds, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
